Notes.Text:
gnutls was updated to fix several security vulnerabilities.

- fix double free in certificate DN decoding (GNUTLS-SA-2015-3)(bsc#941794,CVE-2015-6251)
- fix invalid read in octet string in bundled libtasn1 (bsc#929414,CVE-2015-3622)
- fix ServerKeyExchange signature issue (GNUTLS-SA-2015-2)(bsc#929690)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The _asn1_extract_der_octet function in lib/decoding.c in GNU Libtasn1 before 4.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via a crafted certificate.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Double free vulnerability in GnuTLS before 3.3.17 and 3.4.x before 3.4.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a long DistinguishedName (DN) entry in a certificate.
